package.description: Robot Precision EKF is used as an AMCL Replacement. Robot Precision EKF fuses a global reference sensor that returns an x,y measurement (eg, GPS), with other velocity sensors (IMU, odometry). The EKF estimates the states: (x,y,theta,velocity,angular velocity). Robot Precision EKF uses a velocity motion model to measure velocities, which allows additional sensors to correct/measure velocity rather than ONLY velocity.
package.author: EJ Kreinar
